entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 9:39 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning late in the afternoon. Fog developing late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:39 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending overnight then cloudy. Fog dissipating near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 9:39 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
